mapper.insert: insert into tbl_staff_career_information(staff_no, start_time, end_time, company_name, job_description, p_name, monthly_salary, notes) values (#{staff_no}, #{start_time}, #{end_time}, #{company_name}, #{job_description}, #{p_name}, #{monthly_salary}, #{notes})
mapper.select:
select * from tbl_staff_career_information
and staff_no like concat('%', #{staff_no}, '%')
and company_name like concat('%', #{company_name}, '%')
and p_name like concat('%', #{p_name}, '%')
